name: Atuin
description: Atuin - Command-Line History Revolution. Enhance your productivity with advanced context tracking and secure cross-device synchronization.
longDescription: Atuin transforms your command-line experience by replacing the standard shell history with a robust SQLite database. It not only records your command history but also captures additional context, providing a deeper understanding of your interactions. Atuin takes productivity a step further with optional and fully encrypted synchronization of your command history between machines, facilitated by an Atuin server. Stay organized, boost productivity, and seamlessly manage your tasks with Atuin.
